events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, showing strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on relevant keywords such as software, engineer, and development experience.
A recruiter specialized in technical hires has been assigned to handle the candidate's file for further processing and scheduling.
The initial screening was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's technical skills and culture fit for the engineering team.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to the screening outcome, expressing strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate on May 20th to further evaluate engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
